verses.roman:
na tasmai prahvaṇaṁ stotraṁ
cakre sattva-parīkṣayā
tasmai cukrodha bhagavān
prajvalan svena tejasā

synonyms: na—not; tasmai—to him (Brahmā); prahvaṇam—bowing down; stotram—recitation of prayers; cakre—made; sattva—his situation in the mode of goodness; parīkṣayā—with the aim of testing; tasmai—at him; bhagavān—the lord; prajvalan—becoming inflamed; svena—with his own; tejasā—passion.
translation: To test how well Lord Brahmā was situated in the mode of goodness, Bhṛgu failed to bow down to him or glorify him with prayers. The lord became angry at him, inflamed into fury by his own passion.
